Name: Supply Chain Management
Description: Covers the management of supply chains from raw materials to finished products.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics and 3 'A' level subjects, 2 of which must be commercial subjects.

Name: Financial Economics and Trade
Description: Examines financial economics and international trade.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' Level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics with a B or better and 2 'A' Level Commercial subjects.

Name: Business and Industrial Economics
Description: Focuses on economic principles applied to business and industrial sectors.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' Level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics with a B or better and 2 'A' Level Commercial subjects.

Name: Computational Economics
Description: Applies computational methods to economic analysis.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' Level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics and 2 'A' Level Mathematics and any one (1) Commercial subject.

Name: Economics and Development
Description: Examines economic theories and their application to development issues.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' Level subjects including a pass in English Language and Mathematics with a B or better and 2 'A' Level Commercial subjects.

Name: Accounting and Finance
Description: Covers principles of accounting and financial management.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' passes including a pass in English and Maths and at least 3 'A' Level subjects, 2 of which must be commercial subjects and an A in 'A' Level Accounting.

Name: Digital Banking
Description: Focuses on the technologies and practices of digital banking.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' Level passes including a pass in English Language and Maths and at least 3 'A' Level subjects, 2 of which must be commercial subjects.

Name: Financial and Accounting Systems Development and Applications
Description: Focuses on the development and application of financial and accounting systems.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' Level passes including a pass in English Language and Maths and 3 'A' Level subjects, 2 of which must be commercial subjects and a pass in 'A' Level Mathematics.

Name: Audit and Risk Management
Description: Covers principles of auditing and risk management.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' Level passes including a pass in English Language and Maths and 3 'A' Level subjects, 2 of which must be commercial subjects.

Name: Forensic Accounting
Description: Applies accounting principles to legal investigations and forensic analysis.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' Level passes including a pass in English Language and Maths and 3 'A' Level subjects, 2 of which must be commercial subjects.

Name: Fiscal Management
Description: Focuses on the management of public finances and fiscal policies.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' Level passes including a pass in English Language and Maths and 3 'A' Level subjects, 2 of which must be commercial subjects.

Name: Public Sector Accounting and Finance
Description: Covers accounting and finance principles specific to the public sector.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' Level passes including a pass in English Language and Maths and 3 'A' Level subjects, 2 of which must be commercial subjects.

Name: Finance, Digital Applications and Law
Description: Combines finance, digital applications, and legal principles.
Faculty: Faculty of Business Management Sciences and Economics
Requirements: 5 'O' Level passes including a pass in English Language and Maths and 3 'A' Level subjects, 2 of which must be commercial subjects.

Name: Cyber Security and Forensic Auditing
Description: Focuses on cybersecurity measures and forensic auditing techniques.
Faculty: Faculty of Computer Engineering Informatics and Communications
Requirements: Must have obtained Advanced Level passes as follows: Mathematics and at least 1 of the following subjects or equivalents: Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Computer Science, Accounts, Business Studies/Diploma IT.

Name: Data Science and Informatics
Description: Explores data science principles and informatics applications.
Faculty: Faculty of Computer Engineering Informatics and Communications
Requirements: Must have obtained Advanced Level passes as follows: Mathematics and at least 1 of the following subjects or equivalents: Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Computer Science, Accounts, Business Studies/Diploma in IT.

Name: Computer Engineering
Description: Focuses on the design and development of computer hardware and software systems.
Faculty: Faculty of Computer Engineering Informatics and Communications
Requirements: Must have obtained Advanced Level passes as follows: At least 2 of the following subjects or their recognized equivalents: Mathematics and Physics/Diploma in IT.

Name: Hardware Engineering
Description: Specializes in the design, development, and testing of computer hardware components.
Faculty: Faculty of Computer Engineering Informatics and Communications
Requirements: Must have obtained Advanced Level passes as follows: At least 2 of the following subjects or their recognized equivalents: Mathematics and Physics/Diploma in IT.

Name: Software Engineering
Description: Focuses on the systematic design, development, and maintenance of software systems.
Faculty: Faculty of Computer Engineering Informatics and Communications
Requirements: Must have obtained Advanced Level passes as follows: Mathematics and at least 1 of the following subjects or equivalents: Mathematics and Physics/Diploma in IT.

Name: Computer Science
Description: Covers the theoretical foundations of information and computation and their practical application.
Faculty: Faculty of Computer Engineering Informatics and Communications
Requirements: Must have obtained Advanced Level passes as follows: Mathematics and at least 1 of the following subjects or equivalents: Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Computer Science, Accounts, Business Studies/Diploma in IT.

Name: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
Description: Explores artificial intelligence concepts and machine learning algorithms.
Faculty: Faculty of Computer Engineering Informatics and Communications
Requirements: Must have obtained Advanced Level passes as follows: Mathematics and at least 1 of the following subjects or equivalents: Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Computer Science, Accounts, Business Studies/Diploma in IT.

Name: Cloud Computing and Internet of Things
Description: Focuses on cloud computing technologies and the Internet of Things (IoT).
Faculty: Faculty of Computer Engineering Informatics and Communications
Requirements: Must have obtained Advanced Level passes as follows: Mathematics and at least 1 of the following subjects or equivalents: Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Computer Science, Accounts, Business Studies/Diploma in IT.

Name: Electronics and Telecommunications Engineering
Description: Covers the design and development of electronic systems and telecommunication networks.
Faculty: Faculty of Computer Engineering Informatics and Communications
Requirements: Must have obtained Advanced Level passes as follows: At least 2 of the following subjects or their equivalents: Mathematics and Physics/Diploma in IT.

Name: Network Engineering
Description: Specializes in the design, implementation, and management of computer networks.
Faculty: Faculty of Computer Engineering Informatics and Communications
Requirements: Must have obtained Advanced Level passes as follows: At least 2 of the following subjects or their recognized equivalents: Mathematics and Physics/Diploma in IT.

Name: Languages and Literature (Post A Level)
Description: Focuses on the study of languages and literature.
Faculty: Faculty of Education
Requirements: At least 2 'A' level passes in which the subject of specialisation is represented. Five 'O' levels including English and one indigenous language.

Name: Languages and Literature (Post Diploma)
Description: Focuses on the study of languages and literature.
Faculty: Faculty of Education
Requirements: Diploma in Education in which the subject of specialisation is represented. Five 'O' levels including English and one indigenous language.

Name: History Heritage and Economic Development (Post A Level)
Description: Examines history, heritage, and their role in economic development.
Faculty: Faculty of Education
Requirements: At least 2 'A' level passes in which the subject of specialisation is represented. 5 'O' levels including English and one Indigenous language.

Name: History Heritage and Economic Development (Post Diploma)
Description: Examines history, heritage, and their role in economic development.
Faculty: Faculty of Education
Requirements: Diploma in Education in which the subject of specialisation is represented. 5 'O' levels including English and one Indigenous language.

Name: Civics Religion and Ethics Education (Post A Level)
Description: Focuses on civics, religion, and ethics in education.
Faculty: Faculty of Education
Requirements: At least 2 'A' level passes in which the subject of specialisation is represented. Diploma in Religious Studies/Theology/Philosophy. 5 'O' levels including English and one indigenous language.

Name: Civics Religion and Ethics Education (Post Diploma)
Description: Focuses on civics, religion, and ethics in education.
Faculty: Faculty of Education
Requirements: Diploma in Education in which the subject of specialisation is represented and 5 'O' levels including English and one indigenous language.

Name: Science Education and Applications
Description: Provides training in science education with practical applications.
Faculty: Faculty of Education
Requirements: At least 5 'O' Level passes including English Language, Mathematics, an official indigenous language or approved equivalent and any other subject(s) deemed necessary by the host department; Have a teaching diploma in a relevant area of study or a relevant qualification as stipulated in the National Qualifications Framework (NQF) as published by ZIMCHE from time to time: and Have attained a satisfactory standard on any entrance test which the University may deem necessary.
